answerText: The Secret History[10] Hampden is based on Bennington College, where Tartt befriended this author of Less than Zero. In 2010 he wrote Imperial Bedrooms, in which the protagonist of Less than Zero has adapted its events into a screenplay.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Rutgers and Virginia A | 4 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel centers on a group of classics students at Hampden College who participate in frenzied bacchanals, partially inspired by Professor Julian Morrow. [10] Name this debut novel of Donna Tartt in which Richard Papen and his friends kill their friend Bunny.
